transcript.text: The end of a mystery right now, right here. What's hidden behind that painting ?
Answer A : a thing to play tic-tac-toe.
Answer B : a photofit of squeezie.
Answer C : a willy ?
Answer D : Cyprien.
And now, end of the votes and right in front of you :
That's it, they won't be able to unravel the mystery unless I do it myself.
My friends, have you seen the new video of Seb, called "You and me "?
when he talks about his relation with his relation with his suscribers
How, all that virtual stuff translate in the real life. Through some real meetings and real moments.
Sometimes it's cool, sometimes it's embarrasing, sometimes strange. Watch his video if you did not,
because it's really funny.
and I totally identified in what he said.
It gave me an idea ! It reminded me a lot of meetings I did with subscribers in real life, with you.
But meetings which were not arranged. Not some stuff in conventions,
Or when I know I'll meet people.
Whether you're with some close friends, or alone, in a hurry or not
In 98% of the cases, when people meet you, it's kind, respectful, sweet.
Really, it's so sweet.
And me, I try to send back some "kind" too.
But I don't know you, so I struggle to find my words !
- Yeah ! And you... hum... You'll be a great mum later, I think !
I dont know what to say as compliments, but I want to say some, since you complimente me,
and you seems so nice. But I know nothing from you, so it's very complicated !
Today, I won't talk about all these positive meetings, enjoyable, cool.
And which represent the majority of time as I meet you.
I'll talk about a minority of meetings, which traumatized me
It doesn't necessarly involve that the person was irespectful or else. Not at all.
But, the context, or the way to do, for some,
lead to my real trauma !
For real, a real trauma !
First situation :
That's true, once in my life, I had a pain, during  several days
In what we call, a huge ball
It start to well !
And, since I spent so much time on the web, and especially where people self-proclaim as doctors
And tell you what they think you have whereas they did not examine you at all.
What they know about you, is your auto-diagnostic

transliterate in a disgusting way
* My left ball hurt for 2 days, will I die ?"
And on the other person read your disgusting self-exam and do a diagnostic
If you have a problem, a pain somewhere, don't feel healthy...
Go to the doctor. Don't open internet !
Otherwise, It's the begining of bad troubles !

So, me, I did not know that back then.
What did I do ? I went on the Internet, telling myself :
"Everytime, I'll read it's a little thing, a little twist of a duct of balls which will be back on tracks, and we won't talk about it anymore..."
Not at all !
What did I read ? I remember so well :
Your ball will be 5x bigger
and turn red.
If you're not doing something before two hours, you may lose it.
What ?
I'll lose a ball, me ?
So I took it seriously, started to be panicked and so on.
Don't worry, I'll talk about the suscriber.
You must think there's no link, but there's one, and it's huge !
So, I call a clinic, which perform ultrasound
I ask them if they perform testicular ultrasound
It's the scientifical term for a balls ultrasound.
The person answer me "Yes, we're doing it in our clinic" and that I can come the next day, at 1pm.
So cool. I just hope that my ball won't die during the night.
The next day, I go over there
BI'm in a waiting room, with other men, which I Iook, telling myself :
"Will they do a tesicular ultrasound too, or not ?"
Because they seems to be in a better mood than me !
Sorry, that was the first time I had to show my private parts to a doctor, for medical reasons.
There's no shame to have.
In fact, the doctor doesn't care at all, totally.
But me, it was my very first time that somebody scan my private parts
So I felt... Not good !
So, the doctor come, I shake his hand and I keep an eye on his face,
To be sure that the guy who will scan my balls is not a subscriber.
Because it's so weird ! It would be too strange if he's a subscriber !
Like he's watching my videos and all, he enjoys it. And now he will touch my ball.
Psychologically, it's awkward. I don't feel good.
Given his age, and how he looked at me, etc..
I tell myself that no, he's not a subscriber. Everything's fine.
I arrive at this dark room. He tells me to get naked.
Which I do.
And then he takes his probe, put some gel on it
and he carefully set it on my testicle.
He performs the ultrasound, it last a bit...
He finishes, and tells me :
"Well, it's not so much, actually there's nothing wrong."
" It must be a small twist. You may have been in a bad position during the night"
"There's really nothing, don't worry, everything's fine"
At the moment, I feel heroic.
I tell myself "Damn, I went through this ordeal"
What's more, I have nothing. My ball is fine. I'll keep it. I'm happy !
While I'm in my thoughts..., the doctor tells me :
" By the way, I love your videos. Keep it up !"
Wait
Did a subscriber just scanned my ball ?
Mum ?
Some of you might think he disrespected me.
But in fact, he saw I was in panic
So he did not tell me anything from A to Z
But at the end he couldn't help it. He really wanted to tell me "I like what you do", " Keep it up".
It wasn't intentionnaly mean, it was kind.
But me, it traumatized me !
There's still one person, among you, who touched my balls here !
It had to be said !
And it was not a laugh between youtubers, no no no, it was just a balls ultrasound.
In short, I came back home. I looked through the window, about two hours, telling myself :
"Holy fuck, I never thought that kind of stuff could happened to me one day !"
Alright !
Second pretty akward meeting
I was walking Natsu in the morning.
I was so grumpy
Sometimes, I wake up grumpy in the morning, like all humans.
I'm heading toward a brand which sell takeaway coffee
* whispers * Article 13, you never know.
And here, I hear :
* screaming * SQUEEEEZIE !
What ?
A dude, yelled at me, so loud, that I think he was a kilometer away.
He was 1 kilometer away !
And when it's like that, I'm a bit afraid of the "Zombies effect"
Like, everyobdy turn their head toward me, etc..
And I really don't like getting noticed in the street
Not because I'm a personnality of the web or something
But just because i don't want to be noticed, I want to be chill
You know, like when you're in a mood and you're in a kind of loneliness for a few hours
You become like an animal. If someone touch you, yo go * screams *
You can totally bite !
So, "I will walk, pretending I didn't hear him"
He's a kilometer away, he will understand..."
Second sream...
*screaming* SQUEEEEZIE !
I start walking faster
Hop, let's go, let's go, let's go !
But he was determined
What am I hearing, while I'm performing that atletic walk ?
The guy did a 150m sprint
And here the guy reaches me, and I tell myself :
" That's it, now that he reached me, he will be cool, and chill.
And maybe he will even apologize to scream that loud"
Not at all...
He punches me in the shoulder
He punches me in the shoulder
A slap...
Even my dad didn't give me some that hard
"So then ! You dont hear me, you don't hear me when I yell ?!"
He dared !
He shouted at me,
Even my mother, when I was secretly playing on the PC, was not shouting at me like that !
You're not my mum !
And you yell louder than her !
He didn't realise, at no time,
that it's pretty brusque for a human being,
that somebody yells at you, several times,
And when he reaches you, he punches your shoulder.
Then, he asked me for a picture, for his son, or whoever.
It drove me mad that somebody didn't even wonder
"Am I disturbing him or not ?"
So, I kindly explained him
"Dude, I'm really sorry, but there,
You just screamed many times "Squeezie" in the street. It embarrassed me so much"
"And when you arrive, it's not like if you kindly accost me, you punch me in the shoulder, see ? That's not cool"
" So, no I wont take a picture with you. And next time, think back to your behavior"
"I'm a human, you can't consider me as an animal"
And the guy became crazy. He started to insult me.
He was like "Oh yeah ? Asshole, moron !" And that's what traumatized me.
The guy suddenly got mad, insulted me, made a scene in front of everybody.
Whereas someone just yelled at me !
I did not ask for it, I was peacefully walking my dog !
If he did a respectul and kind move, there would be no problem
But here, dude, it was so aggressive !
I still hear his :
* screams * SQUEEZIE !
I'm scared !
I swear that somebody, screaming at you, in public, so loudly,
running after you and everybody's watching you since they're not understranding what's happening.
Well, you dont want to give what the person wanted
because it's rulling in his favor, of having such a behavior.
There were a plenty of times where I let it go
But this time, I told myself " No, that's too much, that's a nonsense, I'm not an animal..."
That was really shocking. I was being yelled at, insulted, by a stranger, in the street
I spent a great day after...
So, I'm coming to the third story
One day, I was in Japan, on holidays, peacefully.
I was strolling in a street of Tokyo
I saw that there was a little group of french who recognized me.
But they had the behavior of people who recognize you, but don't dare poking you on the shoulder in order you to turn around.
So they keep some distance and follow you more or less time, doing some
" Squeezie !"
Time to time.
But they did it for a really long time ! Like 25 minutes !
I was walking and it was like
" Squeezie !"
And since I was in Japan, in a "vacation mood", big pause from youtube, internet, and so on...
It brought me back to my everyday life and it made me angry.
I was like... No, leave me alone ! I was an ogre, an ogre !
Actually, I turn left to go to a shop
And the guy broke away from his group, take the street, follow me and poked on the shoulder.
I turn around, and I still feel guilty. But you'll see what's next, it end well.
I've been so rude, I've really been a jerk and I blamed myself for it.
"Dude, for a start, you scream my name, for so long, I heard you, that's enough."
"What's more I'm in holidays, so no pictures, or nothing else. Sorry, Have a good day".
Yeah, I was moving in office chair in Tokyo...
While I was telling him this jerk speech, I saw his face.
A sweet, happy, face. Really, a face of a nice guy who really did not want to disturb, but couldn't resist to meet me
Because he knows that it won't happen again, and he really wanted to tell me something.
And I don't know, during 5 minutes, I was thinking about it in the shop
And I tell myself " It's not possible. I have to go back, it's too unfair what I did to him. It's totally unfair".
"I have to meet him, to apologize".
So I run out of the shop, I run in the street. I'm looking for him, on the left, on the right. I can't find him.
I run, run, run.
And I finally glimpse him. He caught up his group of mates
And I tell him " I'm really sorry for what I told you. It was really not nice from me.
Excuse me"
And the dude looks at me and say :
"Hey, there's no problem at all, you're on holidays, I understand.
I'm really sorry that I disturbed you"
And here I wanted to cry, as he was so kind !
Kind and so benevolent !
I was so rude and he didn't take it badly !
He was like "Yeah, that's okay, he's busy, in vacation with his girlfriend... I get it"
So nice ! And I was so glad that i came back to see him, that we chatted with his friends for 15 minutes
He was an expatriate, and his friends joined him in Japan.
So they were spending a week in Japan amongst friends
So it was a really cool moment, talk
Thanks to you, if you're watching this video ! And sorry !
It shows that, sometimes, people who accost you can use the wrong way
But, the same for us ! In our answer, we can be wrong, and even more !
There you go, it affected me. It was two years ago and I still think about it regularly.
Each time I think about it, I tell myself " no matter the person who's coming for you, it's not mean
They're just touched to see you in real"
Even if it bothers you sometimes because you're in a hurry or in a bad mood,
We must not treat them like I treated that guy
That was real lesson for me. So, thanks to you !
Right !
Once, something horrible happened to me 4 years ago.
My address leaked out on the web
Here, it's simply the worst thing that can happen to a youtuber.
It's horrible. They're a lot of people among you who can't imagine that,
but there's truly some people  who come, ring, ring and ring at the bell.
Who, in fact, are harassing.
Here, I'm in the studio, I'm at my office, I'm in my professional setting. So I pretty dont care.
But in the private life, that's tight.
When there are some group of people who constantly ring at your door
That's not funny
In fact, that happened to me when I was living in Arceuil-Cachan.
My adress did not leak out on the web, but there was a University where people knew that I was living there.
But it was a building, so there was a entry code, they rang at the intercom. That's okay.
But ! Later, I moved.
I moved to a house, in L'Hay-les-Roses
A house without front gate
You had access to the front door, right on the street.There was no portal or anything else. No protection
And, when I was coming back home, everyday, there were some teenagers in front of the house.
So I was telling them, "Friends... it's private life here. You're waiting in front of my home, that's a bit borderline."
But the worst, sometimes, I was in the living-room, watching Netflix or whatever
And there were windows on the right. And I look at the right
And I could see people, who had their face stuck to the window.
Watching at my home like that. I looked at them, and I couldn't do anything.
I was like " Damn, is that my life now ?" Having little imps at my windows who say "iiiiiii"
And I know it's not mean from them
They don't know that it hurts you, and pissing you off
They don't know at all, they have no doubt about it
Usually, they're really young people, not people of my age
Me too, when I was their age, I was not aware that by doing that, it bother
the person that you're looking at.
So..So it was like that for many months
A "Big-Up" to all that folks who saw me in pants on my couch and watch through my window.
I hope, at least, that you, you enjoyed the moment.
I hope that the show met your expectations !
Last thing !
A meeting, not so long ago, that I did.
There are also people who are so sweet.
They come, and they definitly don't want to bother you
Even if you tell them " You don't bother me"
They'll answer you " Yes I am, I can see it, bye, I love you, bye"
That's really sweet from them.
In fact, they love you so much, that they don't want to take a slight risk to bother you.
I find this so adorable !
Just this morning, as I record that video,
A guy, I will call "Mister Super Dry", because he had a backpack Super Dry
That's all I can remember !
Big "Big Up" to you if you're watching this video !
He came and told me " I dont want to bother you but thanks for you videos"
"They helped me, in a moment of my life that I was not feeling well. They really relieved me."
"Ever since then, I got back on my feet. I wanted to thank you for what you did to me. Keep it up."
And he cleared off, like that.
But me I wanted to talk to him !
" Mister Super Dry !"Wait ! You're really nice !"
But he was leaving, whatever happened.
As if he was dead, and his soul remained on Earth
And he needed to tell me that before flying away to heaven.
That's really what I felt !
I could have scream or whatever. No he was leaving !
He said what he wanted to. He's leaving, proudly and happy of that moment
Very short, but very intense.
There it is.
Feel free to wish a "Big Up" to Mister Super Dry in the comment section. He'll be happy about it.
He was adorable !
It's the end, of these adventures, which were out of the ordinary.
There were plenty of other meetings which were not like that
Which were way more peaceful, usual and cool.
But these ones affected me
Anyway, if you bump into a youtuber, or a singer or an actor, I don't know, that you adore and you want to accost him
Always do it in respectful way
That mean, if he's with his family or his girlfriend
You know he enjoys his moment with some people, and therefore you cut this moment if you accost him
Don't yell his name, accost him discreetly, and I swear there will be no problem.
And sometimes, as I told you, when I'm at the bakery, walking my dog...
It doesn't bother me to talk with you during a while
But sometimes, when I'm not "free". I will cut it short
I will be less receptive
But don't blame me. It's just that there are times for it and some which are not.
But in every case it's cool. But sometimes it can be shorter than other moments
I'm not sure be that clear
See you soon everybody !
Goodbye !
Hey, It's Seb over there ?
Seb ! Hey' Seb !
Hey' ! You're a youtuber, aren't you ? Seb !
